Hacienda Patrón: *Hacienda Patrón:* We are located at Kilometer 27 Carretera Tototlán - Atotonilco, Rancho el Nacimiento, Postal Code 47750

The Baker position has rotating shifts from 6:30 AM to 2:30 PM, 2:30 PM to 10:00 PM, and 10:00 PM to 6:30 AM. The salary is approximately $2,000 net per week, plus legal benefits, safety equipment, and transportation. Additional benefits (Savings Fund, Pension Fund, Grocery Vouchers, Life Insurance, *1 Bottle per month*, Uniforms, _these will be provided after the third month_).
Permanent position is granted after 3 months of service
